title: Sets forth notification requirements on abortions performed on minors
summary: Requires parental notice prior to the performance of an abortion upon an unemancipated minor; defines unemancipated minor as person less than eighteen years of age; allows for waiver of such notice in limited instances; establishes circumstances and procedures for proceedings to obtain an order waiving such parental notification.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the family court act, in relation to notice of abortions performed on unemancipated minors
